alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 2:06AM PST until January 16 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio, Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest, Mountains of San Benito and Interior Monterey County including Pinnacles National Park, Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley, and Carmel Valley and Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Given the very saturated soils, trees and branches can easily fall down in breezy to gusty conditions. Downed trees can threaten lives, cause power outages, and fall into waterways which could exacerbate flooding conditions. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Please alert your county officials if you see trees that look weakened from recent storms. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
